description:
Having solved the mysteries, Kindaichi reveals how he was framed for murder, and who the Count of Monte Cristo really is!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kindaichi Shounen no Kesshi Gyou File. 4
The Death March of Young Kindaichi, File 4
Voie sans retour pour Kindaichi ! Dossier 4
金田一少年の決死行 File.4
